bike.description: FACT IS-X 11m carbon front triangle, M5 rear triangle, tapered headtube, PF30 BB, ISCG '05 mounts, internal Command Post IR routing, 142+ dropouts, full cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 165mm travel

components.description: Custom Cane Creek Double Barrel Air, high/low speed comp and reb adj., climb switch, 215.9mm x 57.2mm
1-1/8 and 1-1/2" threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized Command Post IR, 3-position, internally routed adjustable height w/ air spring, remote operated, single bolt head, 30.9mm, S:100mm, Others: 125mm travel
7050 hard anodized alloy collar, single bolt, 34.9mm
Bottle cage w/ SWAT Technology compatible (not included)
